segments.text: I know that you are interested in our washers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we are thinking of placing an order . However we would like to know what kinds of machines are available for export and in addition your sales terms , including mode of payment , discount and possible date of delivery .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We supply washers of all types and sizes . We have years of experience in the manufacture of washers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have read about this in your sales literature . Could you give us some idea of your prices ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our prices compare favorably with those offered by other manufactures either in Europe or anywhere else . Here are our latest price lists . You will see that our prices are very attractive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you take special orders ? That is , do you make machines according to the specific requirements from clients ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long does it usually take you to make delivery ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: As a rule , we deliver all our orders within three months after receipt of relevant L / C . It takes longer , of course , for special orders . In no case would it take longer than six months .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . One more thing , we'd like you to quote us on CIF basis .
segments.speaker: S2
